rows.label: qev095301_MSG0001
rows.name: Oh! Perfect timing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0002
rows.name: I was just about to drop by the barracks to see you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0003
rows.name:
I have a top-secret mission straight from the director
general. Veeery hush-hush and all that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0004
rows.name:
So can you spare a moment?
Great! Here goes...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0005
rows.name:
We received a report from a Curator surveying
Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0006
rows.name:
It seems that some Ganglion troops are gathering at the
mouth of Dead Man's Gulch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0007
rows.name: They're a survey team, judging from their equipment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0008
rows.name:
Which means there may be something important there
besides the big Skell you recovered before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0009
rows.name: That's Director General Chausson's theory, anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0010
rows.name:
He wants you to go there and figure out what exactly
they're after.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_JNK0010
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev095301_SEL0011
rows.name: Promise to get the job done.

rows.label: qev095301_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev095301_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that you're not going back to that awful place.

rows.label: qev095301_JNK0030
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev095301_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Stella how much the job pays.

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0011
rows.name: That's great![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0012
rows.name: I can see why the director general would come to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0013
rows.name: Here's the detailed brief.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0014
rows.name:
You're a mimeosome, remember? The indigens there
only respond to organic life. Nothing to worry about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0015
rows.name:
Besides, the director general seems set on you handling
this one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0016
rows.name:
He had some real high praise for your track record.
Said you were the only one for the job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0017
rows.name: Are you sure you want to turn him down?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0018
rows.name: Heh. Spoken like a true professional.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0019
rows.name: So you'll do anything, so long as the pay is worth it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0020
rows.name: Well then, how does...THIS amount strike you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0021
rows.name: No dice, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0022
rows.name:
Well, I can tell you that Director General Chausson
won't budge on the reward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0023
rows.name: So, um, just tell me if you change your mind, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0024
rows.name:
He seemed dead set on you being the one who
handled the job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0025
rows.name:
You're familiar with the territory so I doubt you'll get
lostâ€”but be careful out there regardless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0026
rows.name: We'll be waiting for your report. Make it good news.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0027
rows.name: Back empty-handed, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0028
rows.name:
Director General Chausson cares about results,
and that's pretty much it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0029
rows.name:
And right now he wants to know what the Ganglion
are after in that canyon, so I suggest you go find out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0030
rows.name: I look forward to your report.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0031
rows.name:
Welcome back. Looks like you brought back even more
than the director general had hoped.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0032
rows.name:
He was practically beaming. Said that your freeing the
Zaruboggan from the bonds of Ganglion servitude was
deserving of high praise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0033
rows.name: ...Oh, and here's your pay. Can't forget that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0034
rows.name:
The Zaruboggan are in quarantine now. If the tests
come back clean, they'll be living in New LA with us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095301_MSG0035
rows.name:
They seemed really grateful to you, so you might want
to speak to them once they're cleared.[ST:wait ]
